short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a torrent from magnet link to Transmission daemon

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension lets you right click on a magnet link and send it directly to your Transmission torrent daemon. The daemon login information should be configured in the extension's options page.
